verses.1: Kitawng kawmkawmin pawipi sungah annekna sangin lungnuam takin mohkeu them khat nekna hoih zaw hi.
verses.2: A pil silapa in a topaʼ ta hai tungah aana nei-in a topaʼ gamh pawl khat a luah hi.
verses.3: Kham le ngunte mei sungah kize-et a, mihingteʼ lungsim Topa in ze-et hi.
verses.4: Migilote in gitlohna thu bek mah ngaihin nei uh a, zuautheite in zuau thu mah ngaihin nei hi.
verses.5: A zawngte a simmawh pa in amah a Piangsak pa a simmawh hi a, midangteʼ tuahsiatna ah a lungdam mipa in gim thuak hamtang ding hi.
verses.6: Tute pen puteekte adingin minthanna lukhu hi a, tate pen pateʼ minthanna ahi hi.
verses.7: Mi liante in zuau thu gen ngei lo a, mihaite in na-a kimang kam pau ngei lo hi.
verses.8: Sumgolh a zangte in ai bangin ngaihsun uh a, a deih khempeuh uh a ngahsak dingin ngaihsun uh hi.
verses.9: Miʼ khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, miʼ khialhna ciaptehna pen lawm taanna ahi hi.
verses.10: Mihai khat zavei a kisatna sangin mipil khat khatvei tai-na in bun zaw hi.
verses.11: Thusia bekbek a deih tawntung migilote kiangah, a gilo kamtai pa bangin sihna tung ding hi.
verses.12: Mihaite a hai gamtatna uh i tuah khak sangin a no a kilaksak vompi hang khat tuak lehang hoih zaw lai hi.
verses.13: Thuhoih kimlai thusia tawh a thukteʼ inn sungah cikmahin thusia veng cih omngei lo hi.
verses.14: Kitot i kipat ciangin tui lipi cinna phung kehsak khak tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih manin a nasiat ma-in kitot khawl pak in.
verses.15: Migilote khah khongna, thuman mite mawhsakna, a nih tuakin Topa in deih lo hi.
verses.16: Mihai pa in thu ngaihsun thei lo ahih manin pilna zon nading sum tampi a zat hangin a phattuamna om lo hi.
verses.17: Lawm citak in a tawntungin hong it a, i sanggamte pen i lungkhamna a hong thuakpih dingin a piang ahi hi.
verses.18: Thu a ngaihsun thei lo mihaite bek midangʼ leiba lohsak dingin kipia ngam hi.
verses.19: Khialh ding a utte lungkham ding a ut hi a, kihisak-a kam paupaute buaina ding a zongzong ahi hi.
verses.20: Lungsim hoih lote in lungdam mu lo uh a, mi a khem theite in lungkhamna tuak uh hi.
verses.21: Tapa hai pen a paʼ lungkhamna hi a, ta hai a nei pa a lung dam lo hi.
verses.22: Maitaina in cidamsak a, maigum tawntungna in guhtui teep kang hi.
verses.23: A gina lo thukhente in sumgolh sang sim uh a, a thukhenna uh ah thuman om nawn lo hi.
verses.24: Mipilte in a hoih penin gamtat nading thei uh a, mihaite in a cih nading thei lo uh hi.
verses.25: Ta hai in a pa dahsak a, a nu lungkhamsak hi.
verses.26: A thuman mi gimpiak ding hoih lo a, mihoihte satna pen thukhialhna ahi hi.
verses.27: Thu a thei taktakte in gengen khol lo a, a paupau khol lote thumu taktak hizaw hi.
verses.28: Mihaite pau loin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilat nadingin pau loin om khinkhian in.
